articles.author: Arizona Republic, Yvonne Wingett Sanchez and Pamela Ren Larson and Anne Ryman and Kaila White, Arizona Republic
articles.title: Melania Trump tours Southwest Key migrant facility in Phoenix
articles.description: During her first visit to Arizona as first lady, Melania Trump toured a Southwest Key location in west Phoenix. Earlier, she stopped in Tucson.

articles.author: Arizona Republic, Kelsey Mo, Arizona Republic
articles.title: Michael Avenatti expected to speak at Phoenix detention center holding immigrant children
articles.description: Michael Avenatti said he will be delivering letters and hope to immigrant children who have been separated from their parents.

articles.author: Arizona Republic, Kelsey Mo and Kaila White, Arizona Republic
articles.title: Stormy Daniels lawyer Michael Avenatti representing 5 immigrant children held in Phoenix
articles.description: The celebrity attorney met with a mother detained in Laredo, Texas, and then delivered a letter from her to her a 6-year-old son housed in Phoenix.

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Dustin Gardiner, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Arizona aquifers are in trouble, but lawmakers want fewer rules for pumping groundwater
articles.description: As water experts and environmentalists advocate for tighter groundwater restrictions, Arizona Legislature are pushing to cut regulations.
